website_summaries.verdict: It's a bit more costly than our Best of the Best pick, yet it has fewer capabilities and features. We favor the Sangean instead.
pros: Almost 100 hours of battery life per charge
Sleek and splash-proof w/a removable strap that makes it easy to hang in the shower

customer_reviews.title: I find this annoying. Otherwise it works fine
customer_reviews.text: I had the other classic Sony model for 10 years, it finally died. The old one had a fuller sound. This one looks nicer in my opinion. But the part that bothers me is in the instructions is says North american model has 10 fm Presets. I am in North America and it only has 5 fm presets. The old model had 10. I find this annoying. Otherwise it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Read the 1 page sheet in the box. Great radio
customer_reviews.text: This was a direct Sony replacement radio to 1 I had for 20 years. Love Sony's shower radio. Buyer beware that you may have to setup the AM tuning frequency range, read the 1 page document that comes in the box to set this up. If you don't tthe channels you want will be tuned in off frquency.
customer_reviews.author: El West

customer_reviews.title: Redesign gone bad
customer_reviews.text: We've owned MANY of the predecessor model, the Sony ICF-S79W (weather and non weather models). The new design is shorter, bulkier, less easy to pick up and move ESPECIALLY if slightly damp from shower mist. It's boxier and more square and does not fit the hand well at all. The biggest complaint is the sound quality, REALLY TINNY speaker. We played both models side by side to check, and the difference is VERY noticeable. All-in-all...this is a redesign gone bad, and a redesign for no apparent reason. And for $80, I'm sure we can do better somewhere else next time.
customer_reviews.author: Allen S.

customer_reviews.title: Love it! A radio for the shower that simply ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! A radio for the shower that simply does what it is supposed to do without fuss! Good reception, easy to tune, easy to adjust controls even when I'm wet and have no glasses on (I'm in the shower!). You'd think that these things would be obvious and simple, but I have tried other so-called wireless shower radios that got none of these things right. Oh, also, it's just the right size to hang off my shower grab bar. Strongly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory M. Acland

customer_reviews.title: Amazon is not selling the North American model as of 12/2018
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these radios I bought in the past week and NEITHER IS FOR THE NORTH AMERICAN MARKET. It's clear from looking at them they are not for use in NA: they only have AM/FM not AM/FM1/FM2. They cannot be changed to the 10 kHz interval needed for NA as the instructions say. Why is Amazon selling these to their US customers? Please FIX THIS PROBLEM and get the NA model in stock. I like the look of the radio and want to purchase it. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Clewless

customer_reviews.title: Good but not as good as previous Sony product.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product, however we had the previous model and the sound-quality for this one is not as good. Sony Model ICFS79W. The price for that model has almost doubled. Somewhat tinny sound by comparison, and this one lacks weather-band as well. However, the construction quality is very good and it is definitely splash-proof. Consider the Sangean H201A or H202A, we have the H201A and the sound quality is very good but it is much larger and not really possible to place it in the shower easily The Sony unit is very easy to place on the shower-head or curtain rod.
customer_reviews.author: A. Westwood

customer_reviews.title: Great reception and loud enough so I can hear the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. I still have the original version of this model and it still works 7 years later. Just wanted one for my second bathroom. Great reception and loud enough so I can hear the music above the noise of my electric toothbrush. Real easy to setup too.
customer_reviews.author: Vinnyfl

customer_reviews.title: EVERYONE'S PROBLEMS WITH THIS RADIO = They are selling us the European Version.
customer_reviews.text: It's not intuitive but in the instructions. US Versions have 10 FM presets and 5 AM presets. The Euro version has 5 of each and AM scanning is set at increments of 9. You can change it to increments of 10, then the only difference is loss of 5 FM presets Very annoying. My guess is the seller is getting these at a lower cost making a higher margin. For most who expect it to work out of the box this will cause a lot of frustration as they can't tune their AM favorites.
customer_reviews.author: Clack

customer_reviews.title: the timer ends with an alarm that wakes anyone else still asleep
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Sony Shower radio over the past 10-15 years. Easy set up. Rubber strap more sanitary than the "rope" strap that would get soaked and gather germs. However, the worst part about this new iteration is the simple timer that would play my shower radio for, say 10 minutes, while I was showering, shaving, dressing etc (yeah, I'm a simple guy going to work). Previously the shower radio would just shut off, like a simple "snooze" radio or podcast that would shut off. But, no! Now this radio sets off a clock alarm when it shuts off. My wife, peacefully asleep, gets awakened. Bad move Sony.
customer_reviews.author: bdr8888

customer_reviews.title: Nice compact shower radio
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of this radio and it’s easy to use. Seems to be well made. Battery life is excellent. Maybe it’s my bathroom, but I get some static on the AM channel that I like to listen to in the AM. I can’t get the radio to let me tune it to 1320, the actual station number. It’s off by a few digits, like 1323 or something. That’s why I didn’t give it 5 stars. Maybe it would have clearer sound on FM instead of AM.
customer_reviews.author: P. Young

customer_reviews.title: The reception on this radio is great. We previously had the Sony that cost twice ...
customer_reviews.text: The reception on this radio is great. We previously had the Sony that cost twice as much and this one is just as good. The only problem we had was the hanger which is kind of short, but we found a solution. In my book the quality of the sound is most important and this is great.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Dailey

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with this radio
customer_reviews.text: Super shower radio. Bought one last year and it is great so I got another for our 2nd shower. Plenty of sound, digital tuning so stations come in strong, and good battery life. You can't go wrong with this radio!
customer_reviews.author: cbHoo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect (for me) shower radio & clock -- DO READ THE INSTRUCTIONS
customer_reviews.text: I have had three of the previous generation ones and they have been excellent. But I bought this because of the hanging strap, which works perfectly for my shower setup. It is easy to use and sounds fine. I am a Sony fan. Read the instructions or the little piece of paper that tells you how to make it tune U.S. stations instead of Eurozone stations.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Jensen

customer_reviews.title: works great, not enough bass compared to other shower speakers
customer_reviews.text: works great, not enough bass compared to other shower speakers, but the FM stations tune in much clearer and the memory function is good for the different tastes in my family.
customer_reviews.author: Frank D Lucash

customer_reviews.title: Needed a new shower radio
customer_reviews.text: Our old Brookstone shower radio was old, the antenna was cracked, and the reception was poor. I bought this Sony for my husband for Christmas and it works great! Reception is much better than our old Brookstone, and so is the sound. So far so good! I would recommend this radio.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Kwiatkowski

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you receive the North American version
customer_reviews.text: I loved the two original Sony shower radios I’ve had over the years. Purchased this one for a gift. Apparently, from reading the reviews, it is not the North American model. Impossible to manually tune in stations and will not pick up ones the older version does. The fix to hold down the AM/FM button and the #1 button does nothing.
customer_reviews.author: MsHavisham

customer_reviews.title: Was Hoping Price Would Drop
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping that the price on this would drop, but since it wasn't happening, bought it as a Christmas gift. Person who received it was very happy as a Sharper Image shower radio was purchased earlier. Item was received on time & as described. It was a perfect gift!
customer_reviews.author: meijiro

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shower Radio
customer_reviews.text: This is the best shower radio we have experienced! It is easy to set up and is easy to use. The sound is excellent. We have not used the suction cup and it is out of the way of the shower itself. We used the strap provided to hook over a bar.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Franklin

customer_reviews.title: It fits into a small space on the bathroom shelf.
customer_reviews.text: Now I can find out what happened in the world over night as I get ready for the new day. Sound quality is OK. I do not subject it to the shower area. Although it is a bit pricy I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Cookiel

customer_reviews.title: This radio is the next generation S79W
customer_reviews.text: Like its predecessor the S79W, this radio requires 3 C batteries rather than the 2 AA in the description (no weather). Also, this tuner does not allow for single decimal point channel selection--for instance if you want 1070, it only gives you the option of saving 1071. Nonetheless, this tuner is more sensitive than the S79. I really like this new iteration of their classic shower radio and highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Poor AM reception
customer_reviews.text: FM reception is fine BUT AM will not lock on exact signal and reception is very poor and staticy. No manual dial for tuning exactly to station signal.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Improved model.
customer_reviews.text: We were replacing a previous model which broke. This model has a much improved strap, as well as improved control positions. The volume control is conveniently placed on the side, looking like it secures the strap--kind of hidden until you realize what it really is.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Doney

customer_reviews.title: A radio that can't tune the top am station???
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality radio, with one major exception. The one thing I want to do in the morning is listen to morning traffic and weather info. The top station for that in our market (Boston) is 1030. But this radio can only bring in 1024 or 1035. The old version of this same radio had no problem with that. Very disappointed and returning it. Will order a Sangean instead.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy  Lee Peterson

customer_reviews.title: sound inferior to previous Sony model [79]
customer_reviews.text: I have the previous model [79] but it is getting worn out after many years of daily use. I compared the sound of the 80 vs 79, and found the sound of the new model inferior. Otherwise, it is equivalent, but I decided to return the 80 and hope to find a better replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The sound is superb for a shower radio.
customer_reviews.text: I've had shower radios, but this has great sound, and because it's digital, it is far easier to find the channel you're looking for than some of the other shower radio models. It has a removal strap that allows you to hang it or place it on a counter or window sill. I happen like hanging it from my towel rod just outside the shower. Though a bit more expensive than other models, it's well worth the extra expense at $50. I'm extremely pleased with this radio.
customer_reviews.author: PCW.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to pick up station in the shower.
customer_reviews.text: It plays well outside of the shower but not strong enough to pick up a station inside my shower.
customer_reviews.author: dw

customer_reviews.title: I am mostly in weak signal areas. I replace ...
customer_reviews.text: I am mostly in weak signal areas. I replace existing radios with the Sony because the Sony works well when the others fail. I now have three of them, and I no longer have to stand I a certain place holding the antenna in my hand to get a signal. The Sony just finds the channel and I get to listen. Oh yes, I also use it in the shower!
customer_reviews.author: F. Wells

customer_reviews.title: Dead
customer_reviews.text: Died in less than three months. No clock, no sound nothing.
customer_reviews.author: HFI

customer_reviews.title: MINIMAL
customer_reviews.text: This radio is about 4"x4"x2". It is very light, has a strap handle, and takes 3 AA batteries. It is a minimal radio which should have been a much lower price.
customer_reviews.author: Jadjee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Shower Radio In Every Way
customer_reviews.text: My wife dropped her old Sony Shower Radio a few too many times, and the ICF-S80 has made her happy once again. The radio seems to be durable, has great sound, has presets to make tuning and switching stations easy, and has a nice appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Good sound and reception
customer_reviews.text: My daughter reports that this radio has good sound in the shower and very good reception (she lives in a smallish city in Maine).
customer_reviews.author: Angela L.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for, great shower radio!
customer_reviews.text: Paid more than other shower radios, but better quality sound, stronger method to hang radio, auto timer off, preset stations, and C batteries are used for longer radio life.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Rusinko

customer_reviews.title: It is a better design and love the strap
customer_reviews.text: This radio is the new version of an old one I have used for years. It is a better design and love the strap. Works very well
customer_reviews.author: D. Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Dead in three weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Died after three weeks. We have had two others, lasted together a total of 22 years. This one is junk.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Love this Radio
customer_reviews.text: I love this radio, it does exactly what I was hoping for, easy to operate, and the battery lasts forever (I probably shouldn't write that :-) ).
customer_reviews.author: David Southern

customer_reviews.title: Nice, good reception
customer_reviews.text: An improved replacement of the larger shower radio Sony stopped making. No problems. Reception improved once I saw there was an antenna to deploy. :)
customer_reviews.author: W. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't believe how difficult it was to find a simple water-resistant shower radio to replace our previous Sony that finally gave out after many, many years of daily use. This one was more pricey than we'd hoped, but it does the job! It sits in our shower and serves daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Number Cruncher

customer_reviews.title: Must press preset button 1st before the auto off button for Hrz calibration change from 9 to 10.
customer_reviews.text: Should have been more clear to press preset button 1 first before auto off button for Hrz calibration from 9 to 10.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Madurski

customer_reviews.title: Batteries not included...
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as I expected it to, easy to use, charming aesthetic. But they couldn’t include 3 C batteries? That’s not even a standard battery size, pretty inconvenient
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced, undelivers
customer_reviews.text: Have been a sony shower radio fan for a long time. Last one died so purchased new version. What a disappointment. Usually hang off shower head and with short strap, top mounted buttons are inaccessable unless you are over 6 foot. Sound quality is also worse than old unit. Save money and buy another brand.
customer_reviews.author: JEAN G. NICKMAN

customer_reviews.title: Not all stations work
customer_reviews.text: Good quality sturdy , but it has static on some stations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sony Shower Radio works well
customer_reviews.text: I just received the radio but it works fine. I ordered a Sony radio to replace an older version that eventually was worn-out. My experience is that Sony makes a high-quality product that will work as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: TexasReview

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, not many others out there like it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, not many others out there like it. Unfortunately because of that I feel the price was to high for a small digital radio, they kind of got ya. Bought 1 and then bought another for kids bathroom because its a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: ... not include promised suction cup to hold FM wire poor sound quality
customer_reviews.text: delivery did not include promised suction cup to hold FM wire poor sound quality
customer_reviews.author: Jerold Kreisman

customer_reviews.title: Shower radio...Sony is best!
customer_reviews.text: My bf likes it! Not too loud and picks up signal inside his bathroom. Nice white color. Sound comes out perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Nikkirev

customer_reviews.title: Great reception and sound!
customer_reviews.text: This is our move around radio. We owned one before and it was 7 years old! Very good reception and sound!
customer_reviews.author: Robby Tisci

customer_reviews.title: Good reception in the bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding radio. Good reception in the bathroom. High quality sound and very durable construction
customer_reviews.author: Chris Demaree

customer_reviews.title: Nice upgrade.
customer_reviews.text: Great product! We relaxed out 10 year old Sony shower radio with this one. It’s a real nice upgrade!
customer_reviews.author: Kotelly

customer_reviews.title: Shower Radio
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. It has a nice clear sound. I like it is compact.
customer_reviews.author: L. Christie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Even better than the model it replaced. No weather band, but I never used that anyways.
customer_reviews.author: genade

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well so far Push buttons to change stations are much better than the previous shower radio.
customer_reviews.author: Chase Scene

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Terrific little bathroom radio. Waterproof and good reception. Who could ask for anything more?
customer_reviews.author: K. Holland

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Compact, excellent tuning, long battery life, good sound. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Stan Rosenberg

customer_reviews.title: ... in the stations you want and the reception was terrible.
customer_reviews.text: i returned this radio as you cannot dial in the stations you want and the reception was terrible.
customer_reviews.author: scw

customer_reviews.title: Reception
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, it doesn’t get all the radio stations I like.
customer_reviews.author: natalie smith

customer_reviews.title: Would give zero if possible. Item was missing strap ...
customer_reviews.text: Would give zero if possible. Item was missing strap. Item did not work. Would not even turn on. Sending back. Ordered another one. If that one doesn’t work I will seek an alternative product. Surprised Sony would be an issue. Maybe it’s the 3rd party vendor. I will soon find out and update. Also the listing says it runs on 2 AA battery’s. This is also false. It runs on 3 C battery’s. Updated. Received a new unit. This one works as promised. Happy now.
customer_reviews.author: James C.

customer_reviews.title: AM BAND RECEPTION IS POOR
customer_reviews.text: AM BAND RECEPTION IS POOR AND MANUAL TUNING ONLY WORKS IN 9 UNIT INCREMENTS, SO TUNING YOUR LOCAL AM STATIONS IS REALLY A HIT AND MISS OPERATION. AUTO TUNING IS NO BETTER.
customer_reviews.author: JOSE OYOLA-MORALES

customer_reviews.title: Nice but expensive and I can not program AM stations ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice but expensive and I can not program AM stations correctly. No manual way to lock in my favorite local am sports station
customer_reviews.author: Kim Coggins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and weight AM/FM radio
customer_reviews.text: Sony makes a great shower radio. I have 3 of the other Sony shower radios but since all I want is AM and FM I don't need the other more expensive model. This is a nice size and lightweight. I have ordered a second one since the first was a gift for my husband.
customer_reviews.author: NG

customer_reviews.title: Great unit that only lacks in one area relative to predecessor
customer_reviews.text: Very nice unit that replaced the previous version that went out after a decade. Very good reception. Only improvement could be in the speaker volume.
customer_reviews.author: baseballfan

customer_reviews.title: Great radio for shower!
customer_reviews.text: Radio is perfect for use in shower! No issues. Well made!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Anthony Pensabene

customer_reviews.title: Not happy. Wish they still made the old model
customer_reviews.text: Sadly this dose not live up to its predecessor that i had. My son knocked it over and it cracked. This model doesn't have the same sound quality as the other one and dosent pick up my AM stations. For the Money, Not happy. Wish they still made the old model.
customer_reviews.author: mariadiemert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The sound is great and it is compact so it doesn't take up much room.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Buzzeo

customer_reviews.title: 2nd Best Part of the Day
customer_reviews.text: After morning coffee, this Sony Splash Proof Shower Radio is my husband's favorite thing!
customer_reviews.author: Helen M. Dickens

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this radio
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this radio, including the new design. They last forever The one that this is replacing is almost 15 years old.
customer_reviews.author: L. Kucera

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great, FM reception in the shower is a little sketchy.
customer_reviews.author: Comet Tim

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Shower radio!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I live 50 miles from a large city and this shower radio has great reception. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: DOES WHAT IT DOES
customer_reviews.text: Like timer feature. Dislike quality of AM....... but we are in poor AM area.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Takes two C batteries. Have to watch if batteries ...
customer_reviews.text: Takes two C batteries. Have to watch if batteries corrode always.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, easy-to-find buttons even when the radio hangs on the shower head as shown. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding performance! Easy to set up, a delight to use in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Radio for the Shower
customer_reviews.text: This radio works very well and has excellent AM reception.
customer_reviews.author: Jim M.

customer_reviews.title: Great little radio
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. Great little radio. Fits on shower shelf and reception is very good. Would recommend this dealer and the radio.
customer_reviews.author: libarb

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy
customer_reviews.text: This model DOES NOT work in the U.S. It is programmed for China.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Brustkern

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Nice sound. Also since I bought it six month ago. I not replace battery
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived quickly. Radio was a little smaller than expected,but it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Tina_J

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced. Bad reception, atrocious sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: This radio is horribly overpriced. The reception is terrible, the sound quality is atrocious. I wasn't expecting great sound by any means, but it can't even properly reproduce music. You only hear the tiny, high-end part of the music and will have to crank the volume just to hear it. You can't hear bass, kick drum, or any low end part of the music. It is completely in-audible. I had the previous generation Sony shower radio and it didn't suffer from these problems.
customer_reviews.author: aktvst

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was given as a gift. Have not heard about how it works one way or the other. Sorry
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Do not purchase if you want to listen to AM radio. Auto tuning skips over stations.
customer_reviews.author: DJL35

customer_reviews.title: Great as Sony usually is
customer_reviews.text: well built-sounds good-looks great-small enuf to fit in a small cubby of my shower
customer_reviews.author: ALBERT P BROWN

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I cannot get all the stations that I would like to listen to.
customer_reviews.author: barbara forde

customer_reviews.title: It's fine. However
customer_reviews.text: It's fine. However, that AM tuning is trickier than it seems. My AM stations are 1 or 2 digits off.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Halligan

customer_reviews.title: I have used this product before and was very satisfied with it
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product before and was very satisfied with it. This is the second time I am buying this product as I relocated to a new country.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, works well! Super fast shipping, was delivered a day earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Jenda

customer_reviews.title: it is wonderful to listen to clear crisp music
customer_reviews.text: Although it was a bit pricey, it is wonderful to listen to clear crisp music.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Bull

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cute and very easy to carry around - sound is good
customer_reviews.author: Julie E. M. Mcgeoch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is a powerful little radio and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Lori J

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my splash radio icf-s80.i recommended to anyone.thank.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilio A.

customer_reviews.title: ... about 12 years - in our book that is amazing longevity!
customer_reviews.text: We had our previous Sony Shower Radio for about 12 years - in our book that is amazing longevity!! They aren't fancy but they are reliable, have good battery lift, good tuning, a clock, and love the presets . Thrilled to find it on Amazon and even more thrilled when it arrived exactly as described, in perfect condition and on time!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great Bathroom Radio
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my husband who catches the news every morning while getting ready for work (4 AM). He can carry this from bathroom to kitchen to bedroom which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Bonno

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Seems simple when you get it and look at it...but it is difficult, hard to program stations, too expensive for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: MomfromTN

customer_reviews.title: volume was terrible.
customer_reviews.text: I've already returned it. Channels were off, volume was terrible.
customer_reviews.author: howard l. schapiro

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shower Radio
customer_reviews.text: Pros versus earlier model Sony Shower Radio: Solid construction, improved buttons and dial. Cons: Sound quality, while acceptable in the new model, was better in the previous model. So far I am pleased with this purchase and would recommend it as a quality shower radio. Hopefully, the new model battery life will equal that of he older model. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Walters Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: Simply The Best!
customer_reviews.text: Out of all the "Shower Radios" out there, this is by far the best.
customer_reviews.author: eakmkae

customer_reviews.title: I was expecting a better sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Too Bulky for a shower. I was expecting a better sound quality. The display is not good. Overpriced
customer_reviews.author: Marcelo F. Camppos

customer_reviews.title: great compact and lightweight radio
customer_reviews.text: great compact and lightweight radio. excellent speaker and reception in my bathroom. with Sony products, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: sent it back- i could not rig this up to ...
customer_reviews.text: sent it back- i could not rig this up to hang in my shower, which is a standalone. found another radio which did work.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen g

customer_reviews.title: Very good, but....
customer_reviews.text: As one would expect with a Sony product, this radio works very well. My only criticism is that it lacks a Weather Band capability. My previous Sony Shower Radio was able to receive Weather Band stations, and I found that feature to be very useful. When you consider the price of this item, I think that Weather Band should have been included in its capabilities.
customer_reviews.author: Moses Woolf

customer_reviews.title: Sony#1
customer_reviews.text: It's a SONY what else can I say, 5 out of 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: REYREY

customer_reviews.title: Sony quality
customer_reviews.text: I loved the older models ( I have two). This new model is easier to use and has all the same quality features.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

feature_bullets: Splash proof - Enjoy listening to your favorite radio stations while showering
Comes with detachable rubber strap for ease of hanging in the shower
Great sound, loud enough for the shower
Long battery life (approx. 100 hours) and Auto Power Off
